net.letscode.game.auth.shiro

Class ShiroUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.letscode.game.auth.User
      • net.letscode.game.auth.shiro.ShiroUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationInfo, org.apache.shiro.authc.SaltedAuthenticationInfo, org.apache.shiro.authz.AuthorizationInfo

    @Entity(value="Users")
public class ShiroUser
extends User
implements org.apache.shiro.authc.SaltedAuthenticationInfo, org.apache.shiro.authz.AuthorizationInfo
    A User implementation that is compatible with Apache Shiro authentication.
    Author:
    timothyb89
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPrincipals

        public org.apache.shiro.subject.PrincipalCollection getPrincipals()

      • getCredentials

        public Object getCredentials()
        Returns the credentials for this user. In this implementation, the credentials include only the hashed password.
        Specified by:
        getCredentials in interface org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationInfo
        Returns:
        the hashed user password, as a string.

      • getObjectPermissions

        public Collection<org.apache.shiro.authz.Permission> getObjectPermissions()
        Gets the object permissions for this user. In this implementation, an empty list is returned as all of our permissions are stored as shiro-compatible Strings which are converted by the realm.
        Specified by:
        getObjectPermissions in interface org.apache.shiro.authz.AuthorizationInfo
        Returns:
        an (empty) list of object permissions
